title: Effect​
content: This item is read only and cannot be modified. Read Only </> Attune.Effect: PitchShiftSoundEffect  a reference to the PitchShiftSoundEffect linked to this Attune object. for almost all use cases this should not be modified, however, its properties can be.

title: Tuning​
content: </> Attune.Tuning: number the offset (in cents) to apply to the sound before any operation. intended to be used for fine tuning samples.

title: Init​
content: </> Attune.Init( Sound: Sound ,-- the Sound you want to tune. Tuning: number-- <since v0.1.1, default: 0> the offset (in cents) to apply to the sound before any operation. intended to be used for fine tuning samples. ) → Attune creates a new Attune object and instantiates a PitchShiftSoundEffect for future use.

title: SetShiftInSemitones​
content: </> Attune:SetShiftInSemitones( Offset: number-- the number (in semitones) to adjust by. ) → () offsets the pitch of the sample by a number of semitones.

title: SetShiftInCents​
content: </> Attune:SetShiftInCents( Offset: number-- the number (in cents) to adjust by. ) → () offsets the pitch of the sample by a number of cents.
